meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of oospores.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the oosporic structure under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The oosporic cells were carefully examined for research purposes.

meanings.sent4: Her artistic creation was as intricate and detailed as an oosporic design.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with colorful flowers, each with its own unique oosporic shape.
